Name: Around The World
About the game: Around the World is a basketball variant played by shooting 3 point shots from selected areas around the arc. This is a quick paced mini basketball game. Chose f rom a casual free practice where you can play/shoot as much as you want. The standard format, where you need to shoot 7 consecutive shots before you run out of balls. The fast paced drill, a time attack where you have to win within a set amount of time. Key Features Stress-free Practice mode, allows you to shoot hoops just for fun. Time-attack to be the best of the best. Compete against other players by recording your name on top of the leaderboards. Customize your experience from as few as one ball or ten ball limits.
